compliant.section: These service providers shall only use your Information in compliance with our instruction and within the scope of the aforementioned purposes; NUVOTON ensures that all of our service providers strictly comply with the Privacy Policy.
compliant.legal provisions: GDPR Article 28 mandates that data processing agreements must be in place with service providers, outlining data processing purposes, instructions, and ensuring compliance with the GDPR.

compliant.section: We will disclose your Personal Information to comply with applicable law or respond to valid legal process, including from law enforcement or other government agencies; to protect our customers...
compliant.legal provisions: GDPR allows for data processing when necessary for compliance with legal obligations (Article 6(1)(c)) or for the legitimate interests of the controller or a third party, such as protecting customers (Article 6(1)(f)).

non_compliant.legal provisions: While protecting websites is a legitimate interest, it needs to be balanced against data subject rights. The policy should specify the types of threats and how data processing is necessary and proportionate to address them.
non_compliant.amend: Consider rephrasing to: '...to protect the security and integrity of our Websites and prevent fraudulent or malicious activities.'
